title: Water safety: an introduction
creator_contributor_role: Michael Delean and Associates, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Accidents - Prevention
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Life-saving
Hobbies, Recreation & Sport/Aquatic sports - Safety measures
description: Water accidents can be prevented if you know which situations spell danger. But if you find yourself or someone else in trouble in the water, there are specific techniques which can save lives or buy time until help arrives. Here are illustrated a variety of ways to avoid water accidents, the right and wrong ways of helping yourself or someone else in trouble, and survival floating techniques.
